property.name: Text
property.value: Your attachment cards are considered to have Deep Strike (0). Reaction: After a battle ends at a planet, move a card in reserve at that planet to another planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your attachment cards are considered to have Deep Strike (0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit is chosen as an attacker or defender, choose a unit you control. Move an attachment you control between this unit and the chosen unit. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: The effects of this event cannot be cancelled. Reaction: After a unit you control is declared as an attacker, put a non-Hardpoint attachment from your discard pile into play attached to that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached unit gets Sweep (1). Combat Action: Exhaust this attachment to Deep Strike an attachment.

property.name: Text
property.value: This support cannot be targeted. After you play this support, Rally 14 for up to 4 attachments, place them on this support. Then suffle your deck. Reaction: After the deploy phase begins, transfer 1 card from this card to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each army unit you control at an infested planet gets +1 ATK and +1 HP. Reaction: After you win a command struggle at this planet, if there is no enemy unit, infest it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each army unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK while it is infested.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a planet is infested, move this unit to that planet. Then deal 1 damage to an enemy unit at that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an enemy army unit enters play at a planet, your opponent must choose either to exhaust it or infest the planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached unit gets +2 HP. Reaction: After a planet is cleared, exhaust this attachment to deal 2 damage to a target army unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each infestation token is counted as a command icon in your favor at its planet when resolving command struggles.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Move a unit from your HQ to a target non-leftmost planet (from the perspective of the first player) and ready it. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each army unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK while it is infested.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit may be deployed in your HQ. If you do so, reduce its cost by 1. Reaction: After this unit moves to a planet, remove 1 damage from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Target a planet. Each player must move an army unit they control from that planet to their HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Reaction: After a unit moves to this planet, give it Sweep (2) until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first unit each player deploys each turn must be deployed in their HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: No Wargear attachments. Flying. Sweep (3). (After this unit resolves a non-Sweep attack, it may resolve an attack against another unit. It deals damage equal to its Sweep value for that attack.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Each army unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK, +1 HP and Lumbering. Action: Discard this attachment to remove 2 damage from attached unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After you deploy this unit, your opponent may reduce the cost of the next card they play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Behemoth, non-Elite, unit you control. Limit 1 per unit. Attached unit gets +1 HP. Action: Exhaust this attachment to remove 1 damage from attached unit or infest this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deep Strike (2). Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, put into play at this planet 3 [T] army units with a printed cost of 1 or lower and different names from the card collection.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit enters play, put a Novokh unit with a different name or a non-[N] Warrior unit with printed cost of 2 or lower into play from your discard pile at the same location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round you may deploy a card on this support as if it were in your hand. Reaction: After you deploy this support, place a M35 Galaxy Lasgun, a Hot-Shot Laspistol, a Bodyguard, a Seal of the Ebon Chalice and a Defense Battery on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Guardsman token limit is set to 2. Put 2 Guardsman tokens into play at your HQ when you deploy this support. Forced Reaction: After a Guardsman token you control is destroyed put a Guardsman token into play at your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a command struggle, put a Guardsman token into play at that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy a non-[N] unit, exhaust this support to give it +X HP until the end of the round. X equal the number of cards of different factions in your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a non-[N] Warrior unit enters your discard pile from play, put a [Y] on this support. Then if there is 2 [Y] on this support, sacrifice it to search your deck for up to 2 Novokh cards, reveal them, put them to your hand and shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each army unit you control gains Lumbering. Reaction: After a non-Elite [N] army unit enters your discard pile from a planet while an enemy unit is attacking, put it into play at an adjacent planet. (Limit 3 times per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you deploy an attachment, deal 1 damage to attached unit to reduce its cost by 1. Then Rally 6 an attachment, add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attacking an enemy warlord, your warlord gets +1 ATK. While attacking your warlord, enemy warlords get -1 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot include non-[O] units or multiple copies of a non-signature unit in your deck. Interrupt: When a non-signature army unit you control is destroyed, gain 1 [R].

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you put a card in reserve at a planet, move a target unit at that planet to an adjacent planet. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each round, decrease the Deep Strike value of the first card you Deep Strike at this planet by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, move your warlord to a target planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unit you control with the Deep Strike keyword is chosen as a defender at this planet, Deep Strike this event to return the defender to your hand and deal 1 damage to the attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Decrease the Deep Strike value of each card you control at this planet by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to switch the location of two cards in reserve you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Before drawing your starting hand, search your deck for 5 non-[N] non-Deep Strike units with a different faction, place them in reserve at 5 different planets as buried units and shuffle your deck. Interrupt: When you capture a planet, gain 2 [R] to Deep Strike your buried unit at this planet, its Deep Strike value equals its printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you capture a planet, gain 1 [R] to Deep Strike your buried unit at this planet, its Deep Strike value equals its printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is undamaged, it cannot be declared as an attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When your opponent should win a battle at the first planet, Gain 2 [R] to Deep Strike your buried unit at this planet, its Deep Strike value equals its printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a planet. Limit 1 per planet. Reduce the Deep Strike value of each card you control at this planet by 1. Action: Exhaust this attachment to draw 2 cards. Use this ability only if your opponent won a command struggle at this planet this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While checking for a victory condition, your opponent must ignore a planet in their victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each other unit you control gains Lumbering. Reduce damage assigned to each army unit you control by 1. Interrupt: When you deploy a unit, reduce its cost by 1 (min 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: Each other unit you control gains Lumbering. Reduce damage assigned to each army unit you control by 1. Interrupt: When you deploy a unit, reduce its cost by 1 (min 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit exhausts, an enemy non-unique unit at this planet gets -1 ATK (min 1) until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Each enemy unit at a target planet gets -1 ATK (min 1) until the end of a combat round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a unit. Attached unit gets -1 ATK (min 1). While you control attached unit, it gets +5 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to have a target unit get -1 HP until the end of the phase. Then your opponent may apply the same effect on a unit of his choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is attacking an army unit, it gets +1 ATK for each remaining HP the defender has minus 1. Interrupt: When damage is moved to a unit at this planet, increase or reduce the amount by 1. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a non-Hardpoint attachment you control leaves play, attach it to another eligible unit at the same planet or return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust this support to give a target [O] unit Retaliate (2) until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit resolves an attack, another target unit at this planet gains Sweep (1) until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lumbering. While at a planet with your warlord, this unit gains Retaliate (2). Reaction: After you deploy a Nurgle unit at this planet, move 1 damage from an army unit to another unit at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit resolves an attack, put 2 Cultist tokens into play at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: X equals the current round. Interrupt: When your opponent triggers an ability that discards a card from your hand, put this unit into play at a planet to draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play from a planet, infest it and Rally 6 an unit with a printed cost of 3 or less, put it into play at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may deploy this card as a Drone attachment with the text, Attach to an non-Vehicle army unit. Attached unit gains Sweep (3).

property.name: Text
property.value: After setup, put a synapse unit into play from the card collection at your HQ. When you commit a synapse unit, you may modify its commit value by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you commit a synapse unit, you may modify its commit value by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: While at a planet with a synapse unit you control, this unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP. Reaction: After a synapse unit at this planet is assigned damage, reassign all of that damage to this unit instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, gain 1 [R] each time you play an event and your opponent must pay 1 [R] each time he plays an event.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a planet. Attached planet loses its textbox, type (color) and its bonuses are set to 0. Action: Return this attachment to your hand to put a Termagant token into play at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the deploy phase begins, target a planet. If you win a battle at that planet this round, sacrifice this support to put a synapse into play from the card collection at your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your opponent captures a planet, place a Squiggoth Brute in reserve from the card collection at a target planet without Creature unit you control. When you win a battle at that planet next combat phase, Deep Strike it for 1 [R].

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Place a Snotling token at a target planet. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While at a planet with a card in reserve you control, this unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Target a planet where a battle is taking place. Until the end of the battle, each time an enemy unit is destroyed at that planet, gain 1 [R] (Max 4).

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Action: Exhaust this attachment to give a target army unit Sweep (1) until the end of the phase. If that unit has no command icon it gains Sweep (2) instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust this support to place X Snotling tokens into play at a target planet. X equals the number of planets in your victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Place a Snotling token at a target planet. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unit moves to this planet, move this unit to another planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Your opponent targets a planet. They cannot deploy units nor commit their warlord at that planet this round unless there is no other eligible planet. Then draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Reaction: When your warlord is declared as a defender, exhaust this attachment to deal 1 damage to the attacker. If it is already exhausted, ready it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust this support to place X Snotling tokens into play at a target planet. X equals the number of planets in your victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit has [F], it loses Lumbering. Reaction: After you deploy this unit, put an Ecclesiarchy attachment card from your discard pile attached to a unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the deploy phase begins, if this unit is in your discard pile, put it into play at a target non-first planet (ignore this restriction if your opponent has the initiative).

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Each player chooses a number of card to draw on their command dial, reveal it and draw that many cards. Then if you set a lower number, take the difference in [R] from your opponent. If not he takes the difference in [R] from the token bank. If equal draw 2 cards. Max 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +1 HP per attachment on it. Combat Reaction: After an enemy army unit enters play at or moves to this planet, Deep Strike this unit to exhaust that enemy unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Cultist unit you control is destroyed exhaust this unit to put a Cultist token into play at your HQ. (You can trigger only one Ambitious Lieutenants per Cultist destroyed.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, choose 3 different [T] non-signature non-Skill attachments from the card collection, put them into play attached to this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: For the purpose of Hive-mind specialisation, this unit is considered a Termagant token. Action: Put this unit and 2 other units from your discard pile to the bottom of your deck to draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a non-Elite army unit you control. Attached unit gets +2 ATK and +2 HP. Interrupt: When attached unit is destroyed, each player must deal 2 indirect damage among units they control at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Attached unit gets Lumbering and +4 HP. Reaction: After attached unit resolves an attack, put 2 termagant tokens into play at this planet
